modName: Sleet and Lava and Aurora - Guard Number 1s Custom Followers
summary: This mod adds little mage followers that use ice magic and fire magic and thunder magic.
descriptionHtml:
Sleet and Lava and Aurora - Guard Number 1's Custom Followers

Description
This mod adds little mage followers that use ice magic and fire magic and thunder magic.

Specification
Their names are Sleet and Lava and Aurora.
You found them outside of the "Hall of the Dead" in Whiterun, in the graveyard.
It is a mystery why the was in such a place in dressed tattered, but it is likely it is not the age of apparent street.
Status is the same as the high elves.
Body mesh is UNP by default.
Texture uses original from Fair Skin and Pretty Face.
Please do not change the skeleton , such as height , so would change.
Location ... DatameshesActorscharacterSleet_guard1 of mesh
Location ... DatatexturesactorscharacterSleet_guard1 texture

Those necessary for the operation
Skyrim 1.9.32+
RaceCompatibility.esm

Recommend
SIZE DOES MATTER - NPCs do not rescale shrink resize

Installation
The Data folder Sleet_guard1.esm
Please put it in the same location as the folder name the rest of the files.

Uninstallation
Please delete the file that you added during installation.

How to use
You can follower If you call out .

Known bugs , problems
Body is too adultness.

Credit
Guard Number 1 :Whiterun guard twitter:white0guard0 This MOD

Aron ApachiiSkyHair natural Retexture http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35092
Apachii ApachiiSkyHair http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168
Caliente Calientes Texture Blender http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5737
HHaleyy Fair Skin Complexion Sweaty Body http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4557236
Svarog UNP Texture Blender http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30759
tktk Pretty Face http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887

Gamwich (texture advisor) http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5712421

Permission
You must get permission from me before you are allowed to modify my files to improve it.

Change log
February 2, 2014 Release 0.5
February 3, 2014 Release 0.6 Added the ReadMe of English.
February 5, 2014 Release 0.6.1 Fixed such that it corresponds to the installation of using NMM.
March 15, 2014 Release 1.0 Fixed designations of face textures. Changed combat AI. Release official version.
March 16, 2014 Release 1.1 Deleted unnecessary texture.
March 21, 2014 Release 2.0 Changed textures. Added new follower. Fixed a little mesh. Became independent hair.
March 27, 2014 Release 3.0 Added new follower, Changed to 1K hair textures.

------------------------------

Arthenon, thank you for pointing out my mistakes.
GomaPudding, thank you for pointing out my mistakes.
Gamwich, thank you for many advice and production of the texture. Thank you again.
